scripts.text:
-- Check if the external file format exists and create it if not
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat')
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat]
    WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET);

-- Check if the external data source exists and create it if not
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net')
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net]
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'abfss://new-york-taxi@nytaxidatastore2.dfs.core.windows.net'
    )

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 
               FROM sys.external_tables 
               WHERE name = 'green_taxi_data_staged')
BEGIN
    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.green_taxi_data_staged (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME,
        lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        RatecodeID INT,
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        payment_type INT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'rides/green',
        DATA_SOURCE = [new-york-taxi_nytaxidatastore2_dfs_core_windows_net],
        FILE_FORMAT = SynapseParquetFormat
    );
END;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'green_taxi_data_CLEAN' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('dbo'))
CREATE TABLE dbo.green_taxi_data_CLEAN
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT 
    CAST(CASE WHEN [VendorID] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [VendorID] END AS BIGINT) AS VendorID,
    CAST([lpep_pickup_datetime] AS DATETIME2) AS lpep_pickup_datetime,
    CAST([lpep_dropoff_datetime] AS DATETIME2) AS lpep_dropoff_datetime,
    CAST([store_and_fwd_flag] AS VARCHAR(1)) AS store_and_fwd_flag,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [RatecodeID] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [RatecodeID] END AS FLOAT) AS RatecodeID,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [PULocationID] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [PULocationID] END AS BIGINT) AS PULocationID,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [DOLocationID] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [DOLocationID] END AS BIGINT) AS DOLocationID,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [passenger_count] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [passenger_count] END AS FLOAT) AS passenger_count,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [trip_distance] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [trip_distance] END AS FLOAT) AS trip_distance,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [fare_amount] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [fare_amount] END AS FLOAT) AS fare_amount,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [extra] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [extra] END AS FLOAT) AS extra,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [mta_tax] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [mta_tax] END AS FLOAT) AS mta_tax,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [tip_amount] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [tip_amount] END AS FLOAT) AS tip_amount,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [tolls_amount] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [tolls_amount] END AS FLOAT) AS tolls_amount,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [ehail_fee] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [ehail_fee] END AS FLOAT) AS ehail_fee,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [improvement_surcharge] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [improvement_surcharge] END AS FLOAT) AS improvement_surcharge,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [total_amount] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [total_amount] END AS FLOAT) AS total_amount,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [payment_type] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [payment_type] END AS FLOAT) AS payment_type,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [trip_type] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [trip_type] END AS FLOAT) AS trip_type,
    CAST(CASE WHEN [congestion_surcharge] = 'NaN' THEN NULL ELSE [congestion_surcharge] END AS FLOAT) AS congestion_surcharge
FROM dbo.green_taxi_data_staged;

scripts.text:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'fact_trips_complete' AND schema_id = SCHEMA_ID('dbo'))
CREATE TABLE dbo.fact_trips_complete
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT
    t.VendorID,
    t.pickup_datetime,
    t.passenger_count,
    t.trip_distance,
    t.RatecodeID,
    t.store_and_fwd_flag,
    pu.borough AS Pickup_Borough,
    pu.zone AS Pickup_Zone,
    do.borough AS Dropoff_Borough,
    do.zone AS Dropoff_Zone,
    t.payment_type,
    t.fare_amount,
    t.extra,
    t.mta_tax,
    t.tip_amount,
    t.tolls_amount,
    t.improvement_surcharge,
    t.total_amount,
    t.congestion_surcharge,
    t.service
FROM
    dbo.combined_taxi_trips_staged AS t
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones_staging AS pu
    ON t.PULocationID = pu.locationid
LEFT JOIN dbo.zones_staging AS do
    ON t.DOLocationID = do.locationid;
